name: Fantasy Love
description:
Fantasy Love - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!
The plot of it is simple - you have to find pair cards on the level. After that you will see a stunning image of the nicest game girls. Besides, such games help you to develop your view memory. Do the levels, listen to good music, enjoy the images but the most important is getting pleasure!

KEY FEATURES:

- Steam Achievements.
- Simple and clear gameplay.
- Relaxing soundtrack.
- Nice pictures.
- An unforgettable experience.
